DOC.brief_summary: The aim study investigate effect antidepressant paroxetine , plasma level timolol main metabolite topical application ophthalmic timolol product . This phase I , randomise , 4-phase cross-over study healthy volunteer . Healthy male volunteer age 18 - 40 year enrol . Placebo paroxetine give three day 1 drop timolol product administer eye .
